description:
Transform a triangular matrix x, i.e., of class
triangularMatrix,
from (internally!) unit triangular (<U+201C>unitriangular<U+201D>) to
<U+201C>general<U+201D> triangular (diagU2N(x)) or back (diagN2U(x)).
Note that the latter, diagN2U(x), also sets the diagonal to one
in cases where diag(x) was not all one.
